snippet: LEAD: A lawsuit against the State of California filed by the investment group trying to take over B.A.T. Industries P.L.C. has been delayed for two weeks, creating a potential roadblock to the buyout bid. A preliminary hearing has been rescheduled...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: A lawsuit against the State of California filed by the investment group trying to take over B.A.T. Industries P.L.C. has been delayed for two weeks, creating a potential roadblock to the buyout bid. A preliminary hearing has been rescheduled to Sept. 11 from Aug. 28. It will consider whether the California Insurance Commissioner's jurisdiction over B.A.T.

headline.main: Delay in Lawsuit By B.A.T. Bidder
